languages.text: Убедил{mf||а} сержанта Малгара сложить оружие и не убивать аристократов.
Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.
languages.original_text: Убедил{mf||а} сержанта Малгара сложить оружие и не убивать аристократов.

traits.locale_text: Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.
Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.
Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.
Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.

languages.text: 你说服了马尔加军士放下武器，不要杀害那些贵族。
languages.original_text: Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: 你说服了马尔加军士放下武器，不要杀害那些贵族。

languages.text: Has convencido al sargento Malgar de que bajara las armas y no matara a los aristócratas.
languages.original_text: Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Has convencido al sargento Malgar de que bajara las armas y no matara a los aristócratas.

languages.text: 武器を置いて、貴族を殺さないようにマルガー軍曹を説得した。
languages.original_text: Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: 武器を置いて、貴族を殺さないようにマルガー軍曹を説得した。

languages.text: Vous avez convaincu le sergent Malgar de déposer les armes et de ne pas tuer les aristocrates.
languages.original_text: Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez convaincu le sergent Malgar de déposer les armes et de ne pas tuer les aristocrates.

languages.text: Sergeant Malgar überzeugt, die Waffen niederzulegen und die Aristokraten nicht zu töten.
languages.original_text: Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Sergeant Malgar überzeugt, die Waffen niederzulegen und die Aristokraten nicht zu töten.

languages.text: Çavuş Malgar'ı silahını indirip aristokratları öldürmemeye ikna ettin.
languages.original_text: Convinced Sergeant Malgar to lay down his arms and not kill the aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Çavuş Malgar'ı silah bırakıp aristokratları öldürmemeye ikna ettin.
